review: Easy to use and made my old TV smart.  It was very easy to setup - took about 5 minutes to setup including getting my netflix up and running.  Very good for the price, $39.The only downside is it seems that netflix content locks multiple times per show.  It recovers to the 25% mark and then hangs, bounces you out and asks if you want to retry or go to other content.  If you say retry it works fine 9/10 times.  That does not happen with Amazon provided videos.
